about.title: Arman Ayva â€“ Montreal Jazz Composer & Hobbyist ðŸŽ·
about.lead: Where modern jazz meets cinematic storytelling. Arman Ayva is a Montreal-based composer whose sound merges the soul of classic jazz with the freedom of funk and the mysticism of world music.
about.section1_title: From Lens to Loops: A Storyboard of Sound
about.section1_text: Before I began composing jazz, my world was framed through a camera lens. As a photographer and amateur filmmaker, I spent years capturing visual stories. Today, I use those same visual instincts to storyboard with sound.
about.section2_title: The Montreal Fusion: Armenian Soul meets Jazz-Funk
about.section2_text: Based in the creative crossroads of Montreal, my music is a deeply personal exploration of heritage and rhythm. I bridge the warmth of Armenian folk motifs with the high-energy freedom of 1970s fusion and analog synth textures.
about.section3_text: I am not a performing artist; I am a studio-focused hobbyist dedicated to the architecture of sound. By focusing exclusively on production within Apple Logic Pro, I prioritize the intricate layering of live bass and global percussion.
about.section4_text: Creation is only half the journey. As the curator of the 'Funky Jazz Mood Lifter' playlist on Spotify, I connect with hundreds of followers who share a passion for bass-heavy grooves.
about.cta_ready: Ready to dive into the music?
about.disclaimer_lead: All music compositions presented on this website are original works produced by Arman Ayva. We adhere to the highest standards of artistic and legal integrity.
about.disclaimer_tech_text: These works are created primarily using Apple Logic Pro and professional digital audio tools. Some compositions may include sounds or samples from the Logic Pro library.
about.disclaimer_royalty_text: According to Apple Inc.â€™s Logic Pro Software License Agreement, all Apple-provided loops and samples are royalty-free for use in original compositions and can be distributed and monetized.
about.disclaimer_integrity_text: No individual Apple loops are sold on a standalone basis. Every track represents an original artistic composition that has been significantly transformed.
